de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.chars

Class PositionableChar

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.chars.LangChar
      • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.chars.PositionableChar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<LangChar>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsianChar, CuneiChar

    public abstract class PositionableChar
extends LangChar
    Represents a character that is positionable i.e. has middle/single/end/beginning occurances.

    • Field Summary
